name: Chronospark
description:

Systems developer 
Game Design
Code design architect

Breed your creations. Use them to harvest food and crops. Teach children to improve their skills. Build houses and the shrine. 

Controls:

Mouse-scroll: zoom in and out.
Left click on panel: view extra info.
Left click drag person: move and assign them.
Right click drag on planet: rotates the planet.
Right click drag on sky : rotate on the z-axis.
Spacebar: speed up and skip dialogue
